version_description:
- Addressed all players using both one and two handed backhand shots and added an option to the character info menu
- DropShots/Lobs no longer have unexpected behaviour
- Tuned difficulty, lower seed players are easier to beat, higher seed players are more difficult
- Added new tutorials
- Resolved shutdown while loading on some devices

- Updated Serve Marker Visibility
- Requirements for unlocking players are now displayed in Quickmatch

- Resolved all players using one handed backhand shots
- Resolved incorrect OUT calls in some cases
- Improved compatibility with iPhone X
- Corrected minor Tournament draw issue in Career Mode

- PLAYER SELECTION - Play as your favourite AO Star in QuickPlay/Tournament modes!
- A NEW CHALLNGE - Levels of difficulty may now be selected.
- MOVEMENT - Added manual/automatic "Movement" Options.
- SPIN - Increased spin applied for horizontal swipes.

- CLAY COURTS - Complete a tournament to unlock PARIS and play on a new surface
- MATCH HISTORY - Track your progress against each player
- Reduced load times and improved compatibility with some devices
- Resolved an issue making players use unanticipated strokes

- CLAY COURTS - Complete a tournament to unlock PARIS and play on a new surface
- MATCH HISTORY - Track your progress against each player
- Reduced load times and improved compatibility with some devices
- Resolved an issue making players use unanticipated strokes
- Rectified country selection and Rod Laver Arena texture anomalies
- GRASS COURTS - Complete a PARIS tournament to unlock LONDON and play on a new surface

- GRASS COURTS - Complete a PARIS tournament to unlock LONDON and play on a new surface
- Resolved excessive brightness on the London court
- NEW YORK - Complete a LONDON tournament to unlock NEW YORK

- CAREER MODE - Grow your player, raise your skills and win every tournament
- VIRTUAL PAD - Try out the new control scheme for precise movement
- ACHIEVEMENTS - Track your progress and earn them all
- MINIGAMES - Master the new target games to improve your skills
- MARGARET COURT - New stadium available now
